original: If the [[lookup @name]] takes Fire damage, it has Disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks until the end of its next turn.
translation: 若 [[lookup @name]] 受到火焰伤害，则进行的攻击检定和属性检定将具有劣势，直至其下一回合结束。
[[lookup @name]] 在进行先攻检定时具有优势。

original: The [[lookup @name]] can communicate with Beasts as if they shared a common language.
translation: [[lookup @name]] 可以和野兽交流，如同它们有共通的语言一般。

original: When the [[lookup @name]] dies, one random creature within 10 feet of the dead [[lookup @name]] is targeted by a @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplBane000000]{Bane} spell (save DC 13), which lasts for its full duration.
translation: [[lookup @name]] 死亡时，[[lookup @name]] 10 尺内的随机一个生物会被一道法术 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplBane000000]（豁免DC 13）指定为目标，此法术会自动持续至完整持续时间。

original: Disruptive energy extends from the [[lookup @name]] in a 30-foot Emanation. Other creatures can't teleport to or from a space in that area. Any attempt to do so is wasted.
translation: [[lookup @name]] 散发出 30 尺光环区域，令其中充斥干扰能量。其他生物不能传送进入或离开此范围内的空间。任何此类尝试都会被浪费。

original: When the [[lookup @name]] dies, its body disgorges a Hostile @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.actors.Actor.dmgmobImp0000000]{Imp} in the same space.
translation: [[lookup @name]] 死亡时，其遗体的空间中会出现一只敌对的 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.actors.Actor.dmgmobImp0000000]{小恶魔}。

original: When the [[lookup @name]] dies, its body and nonmagical possessions turn to dust. Any magic items it possessed are left behind in its space.
translation: [[lookup @name]] 死亡时，其遗体及任何持有的非魔法事物都会化为尘埃。任何其持有的魔法物品都会留在该生物原本所在的空间。

original: When the [[lookup @name]] dies, its body disgorges a Hostile Ochre Jelly in the same space.
translation: [[lookup @name]] 死亡时，其遗体的空间中会出现一只敌对的 赭冻怪。

original: The [[lookup @name]] has Advantage on saving throws it makes to avoid or end the &Reference[charmed] condition, and magic can't put it to sleep.
translation: [[lookup @name]] 在进行避免或结束 &Reference[charmed] 的豁免时具有优势，且不会因魔法效应而陷入睡眠。

original: The [[lookup @name]] can't enter a residence without an invitation from one of its occupants.
translation: [[lookup @name]] 得不到一位居住者的邀请时无法进入相应的民宅。

original: Imperceptible energy channeled from the Shadowfell extends from the [[lookup @name]] in a 20-foot Emanation. Other creatures in that area have Disadvantage on Charisma checks and Charisma saving throws.
translation: 来自堕影冥界的些微能量环绕在 [[lookup @name]] 周围的 20 尺灵光区域内。区域内的其它生物在进行魅力检定与魅力豁免时具有劣势。

original: The [[lookup @name]] sheds Bright Light in a 10-foot radius and Dim Light for an additional 10 feet. As a Bonus Action, the [[lookup @name]] can suppress this light or cause it to return. The light winks out if the [[lookup @name]] dies.
translation: [[lookup @name]] 散发出10尺半径的明亮光照以及额外的 10 尺微光光照。 [[lookup @name]] 可以用一个附赠动作压制或恢复此光照。此光照会在 [[lookup @name]] 死亡时闪烁着熄灭。

original: The [[lookup @name]] can mimic Beast sounds and Humanoid voices. A creature that hears the sounds can tell they are imitations with a successful DC 14 Wisdom (Insight) check.
translation: [[lookup @name]] 可以模仿野兽和类人的声音。听到此类声音的生物可以在成功通过一次DC 14 的感知（洞悉）检定后认出其模仿本质。

original: The [[lookup @name]] has Advantage on saving throws it makes to avoid or end the &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] condition.
translation: [[lookup @name]] 在进行避免或结束 &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] 状态的豁免时具有优势。

original: The [[lookup @name]] has a supernatural connection to another creature or an object and knows the most direct route to it, provided the two are within 1 mile of each other.
translation: [[lookup @name]] 与另一生物或物件具有一道超自然的连结，使其可以在与对方距离不超过1里时准确感受到通往对方的最直接的路径。

original: The [[lookup @name]] deals double damage to objects and structures.
translation: [[lookup @name]] 对物件和建筑物造成的伤害翻倍。

original: When the [[lookup @name]] dies, a Hostile Slaad Tadpole bursts from its innards in the same space.
translation: [[lookup @name]] 死亡时，一只 史拉蟾蝌蚪 会破体而出，占据其原先的空间。

original: The [[lookup @name]] has Immunity to the &Reference[Frightened apply=false] condition while it can see an ally within 30 feet of itself.
translation: 只要 [[lookup @name]] 能看见其 30 尺内的一名盟友，它便具有对 &Reference[Frightened apply=false] 状态的免疫。

original: The [[lookup @name]] is linked psychically to another creature. While both are on the same plane of existence, they can communicate telepathically with each other.
translation: [[lookup @name]] 与另一生物间具有心灵连结。只要双方都位于同一位面，它们就可以通过心灵感应互相交流。

original: The [[lookup @name]] is immune to any effect that would sense its emotions or read its thoughts, as well as to spells from the school of Divination. As a Bonus Action, the [[lookup @name]] can suppress this trait or reactivate it.
translation: [[lookup @name]] 免疫任何能够感知其情绪及阅读其思想的效应，以及预言学派的法术。[[lookup @name]] 可以用一个附赠动作压制或重启该特质。

original: Whenever the [[lookup @name]] speaks, it can choose a point within 30 feet of itself; its voice emanates from that point.
translation: [[lookup @name]] 在说话时可以选择其 30 尺内一点，并令其声音改为从那点处发出。

original: The [[lookup @name]] has Advantage on melee attack rolls against any &Reference[Bloodied] creature.
translation: [[lookup @name]] 对 &Reference[Bloodied] 的生物发动的近战攻击具有优势。

original: Choose one cantrip; the [[lookup @name]] can cast that cantrip without spell components, using Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma as the spellcasting ability.
translation: 选择一道戏法；[[lookup @name]] 可以无需法术成分地施展该法术，使用智力、感知或魅力作为施法属性。
